channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Restaurant Menu by MotoPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Restaurant Menu by MotoPress

item.title: CVE-2021-24722|2024-08-03T19:42:16.659Z -- unknown -- restaurant%20menu%20by%20motopress
item.description: The Restaurant Menu by MotoPress WordPress plugin before 2.4.2 does not properly sanitize or escape inputs when creating new menu items, which could allow high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed
